title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 43.8 - Candlepower and markings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 43.8 - Candlepower and markings

State Regulations
(a) The total forward lighting of any motor
vehicle headlight system shall not exceed 150,000 candlepower. (b) Each headlamp shall have the markings
"Sealed Beam" and the headlamp code required by Federal Motor Vehicle Safety

Standard 108 (49
CFR
571.108
). (c) Each headlamp shall have aiming pads for
the use of mechanical aimers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
43.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
